songs.title: Again
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
His and hers
I should go and buy a SuperSport again
I should go and buy a SuperSport again
4 grams in my 'wood, it's super stuffed again
Bitch, I got that four-five on my hip again
My new bitch post a pic, she lookin' thick again
Again
In Balmains again
There I go

[Hook]
Went and bought some Maison Margielas
And they cost a stack again (and they cost a stack again)
My old hoe fuckin' with that nigga again (fuckin' with that nigga again)
My new bitch tryna suck my dick again (tryna suck my dick again)
There I go stuffin' racks in Balmains again (stuffin' racks in  Balmains)
It's racks on me, two racks on me, six racks on me (six racks, six racks)
Six racks on me, old hoes keep tryin' get back on me (get back, get back)
Focused on money, I got a bad bitch at home, sleep (bitch at home, sleep)
Might buy two Rubicons and that's one his and hers, G (that's one his and hers)

[Verse]
I should go and buy a SuperSport again (SuperSport again)
4 grams in my 'wood, it's super stuffed again (4 grams in my 'wood, it's super stuffed again)
Bitch, I got that four-five on my hip again (on my hip again)
My new bitch post a pic, she lookin' thick again (she lookin' thick again)
Two zips on me, OG only, it's pack on me (on me)
Your bitch text me, she tryna see me, she back lonely, yeah (she back lonely)
She just fuck me and come back to you, don't she (to you, don't she)
I put codeine in just about any cold drink

[Hook]
Went and bought some Maison Margielas
And they cost a stack again (and they cost a stack again)
My old hoe fuckin' with that nigga again (fuckin' with that nigga again)
My new bitch tryna suck my dick again (tryna suck my dick again)
There I go stuffin' racks in Balmains again (stuffin' racks in  Balmains)
It's racks on me, two racks on me, six racks on me (six racks, six racks)
Six racks on me, old hoes keep tryin' get back on me (get back, get back)
Focused on money, I got a bad bitch at home, sleep (bitch at home, sleep)
Might buy two Rubicons and that's one his and hers, G (that's one his and hers)

[Outro]
Went and bought some Maison Margielas
And they cost a stack again
My old hoe fuckin' with that nigga again
My new bitch tryna suck my dick again
